entry.tran: (橄榄球或足球中的)防守后卫
entry.def: In rugby or football, a full-back is a defending player whose position is towards the goal which their team is defending.

means.word_mean: 1. (football) the running back who plays the fullback position on the offensive team
2. the position of a back on a football team
